head.supplied: Adelaide ¶ ¶ Your letter of the 23rd covering the one from the Baron was duly received, I could not see Mr [Goyder] today but asked Mr Jones to do so and see if the desired alteration could be made. ...

div.p: A38, letter book, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

Your letter of the 23rd covering the one from the Baron was duly received, I could not see Mr [Goyder] today but asked Mr Jones to do so and see if the desired alteration could be made. Personally I do not think it can be, as though it is easy enough to add to a map it is not easy to take anything off. The Mt referred to by the Baron is Mt Mueller whereas I named the other one Mt Von Mueller so there is a difference — Jones will see Mr G. tomorrow.
Please tell the Baron and Mr Panton that I shall be ever grateful to your Council for your Kind letters & endeavours to get me out again —.
